I'm an old poppy main as well and i love her new ult. I don't really see it as Niche at all, infact i see it as an all purpose CC tool. 

You use the un-charged double tap version as an instant knock up for engages and or hard CC to secure a kill, and you use the charged "send them flying" version as an escape. Very rarely will you use the charged version offensively in a fight as it is too difficult to land properly without sending someone you don't want flying away.

E Stun > Q > AA > W (keep them from dashinga way after stun) > AA > R (buy time for E cooldown, reposition for stun)  > E Stun > QQ > AA > AA. You can pretty much lock someone down and take all their health if your good at the combo.
It's also good in teamfight to divide their team and allow access to those sweet sweet squishies
